title: please help me....
body:
hi guys,
if anyone could help me, it would be much appreciated. I just started league and i wanted to play today, right when i joined a custom match to 1v1 a random person, it said unable to connect to server. please check your network connection and attempt to reconnect to the game. this happens right after champ select. I tried everything that i cud possibly think of.  my wifi works regularly but i just cant start a league match
please help me
thanks

replies.body: I finally figured out how to fix. Start a tutorial game. After finishing it, it fixed. lol I don't know why. lol
whats tutorial game, the intro for coops?

> [{quoted}](name=YASUO ONLY 69,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=AYX1HYFN,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2016-10-28T21:12:53.973+0000)
>
> whats tutorial game, the intro for coops?

its after the introduction howling abyss game
I am getting the same issue!!!!!!!!!!!!!

> [{quoted}](name=RadarLWD,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=AYX1HYFN,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-28T05:56:46.713+0000)
>
> I am getting the same issue!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Happened to me too, its very annoying, i got placed in lower priority for 20 min wait

BTW RIOT WHY IS A 20 MIN WAIT EVEN A THING, I HAD EMERGENCIES SOMETIMES AND ITS VERY ANNOYING!!!!!!!!!!

hey bro, i feel u.
the only reason i started this smurf cuz riot screwed me over on my main with the 20 min crap

It sounds like your network is failing to connect to the game servers.  I know the issue seems to be fixed now, but there's no guarantee it won't happen again without some troubleshooting.  I recommend using the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to make sure that your connection can stay consistent.  Hope that helps!
It forced me to leave two ranked game!!!!!!
